person.name: Francisco J. Viñas
person.description: Elder Francisco J. Viñas was sustained a member of the First Quorum of the Seventy of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints on April 4, 1998. He served earlier as a member of the Second Quorum of the Seventy since April 1996 and as an Area Seventy in the Europe West Area. He has also served as president and counselor in the South America North, Chile, and Caribbean Areas, and counselor in the Europe West Area. He is currently serving as a counselor in the South America South Area.
